Articles.Content:
Ok, i have made a custom part with like max 10000 unit of mono.propellant.

In VAB, i can tweak the amount at +/- 1000 intervals, can i change the interval to like +/- 500?? and how if so?

THank you.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development is the place to ask about how to make add-ons/custom parts like yours.
As far as I know, all VAB tweaking is at levels of 10% of the part's capacity. It seems to be something in the game engine. Maybe a VAB mod does what you want?
